summary: {"what_changed":"New articles and updates were added to the Google Blog, including 'Ask a Techspert: What is inference?', 'Find out the latest Gemini updates with Gemini Drops', 'Turn your photos into videos in Gemini', 'Check out the first images of wildfires detected by FireSat', 'How we built one of the most ambitious datasets in brain activity research', 'Google Beam: Our AI-first 3D video communication platform', 'New in Gemini Code Assist: Agent Mode and IDE enhancements', 'Gemini CLI: your open-source AI agent', 'Listen to a conversation about the newest AI capabilities in Search', and 'Transform your photos into videos and remix your pics in Google Photos'","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Added new articles under the 'Gemini App', 'Research', 'Developers', and 'All the Latest' sections","Updated the 'Gemini Code Assist' with new features","Introduced 'Gemini CLI' as an open-source AI agent","Added a new podcast episode about the newest AI capabilities in Search","Updated Google Photos with new features to transform photos into videos and remix pics"]}

{"what_changed":"Addition of new news articles and removal of old ones, update of featured news section","change_type":"update","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Addition of 'Thoughts on Americaâ€™s AI Action Plan' news article","Removal of 'Detecting and countering malicious uses of Claude: March 2025' news article","Update of featured news section to include 'Anthropic raises Series E at $61.5B post-money valuation' and 'Introducing the Anthropic Economic Index'"]}

{"what_changed":"New articles and updates were added to the Google Blog, specifically in the AI, Research, and Developers sections.","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["New article: 'Check out the first images of wildfires detected by FireSat'","New article: 'Transform your photos into videos and remix your pics in Google Photos'","New article: 'Startups can apply now for the Google for Startups Gemini Founders Forum.'","Updates to Gemini Code Assist and Gemini CLI"]}

{"what_changed":"Reorganization and updates of GitHub Copilot documentation, including changes to billing, concepts, and how-to sections","change_type":"update/restructure","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Updated billing section with new links and information","Added new concepts such as 'text completion' and 'create a custom model'","Reorganized how-to sections for better clarity and added new topics","Updated links and information throughout the documentation"]}

{"what_changed":"Introduction of GitHub Spark, a new feature, and updates to the pricing plans with additional details on premium requests and model access","change_type":"update","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Introduction of GitHub Spark","Update to Pro plan with unlimited agent mode and chats, and access to more models","Update to Pro+ plan with access to all models and 30x more premium requests","Addition of GitHub Spark to Pro+ plan features"]}

{"what_changed":"New announcements and updates were added to the newsroom section, including partnerships, product updates, and policy changes.","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Added announcement about Anthropic partnering with the University of Chicago's Becker Friedman Institute on AI economic research","Added announcement about Paul Smith joining Anthropic as Chief Commercial Officer","Added product updates, such as Claude for Financial Services and Discover tools that work with Claude","Added policy updates, such as Build AI in America and The need for transparency in Frontier AI"]}

{"what_changed":"Rephrased introduction to Perplexity Pro","change_type":"update","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["Changed 'Perplexity Pro is the most powerful way to search the internet' to 'Perplexity Pro unlocks more ways to learn and get work done'","Added 'Upgrade your productivity and learning with unlimited Research' to the Pro description"]}
{"what_changed":"Removal of Voice feature","change_type":"removal","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["Voice feature button removed from the interface"]}

{"what_changed":"The content has changed from a security verification page to the OpenAI homepage, featuring various products, research, and company information.","change_type":"major overhaul","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Introduction of new products and features such as ChatGPT, Sora, and API Platform","Addition of research and company information sections","Removal of security verification page content","Update of the website's layout and design"]}

{"what_changed":"The content changed from a security verification page for www.perplexity.ai to a ChatGPT interface","change_type":"update","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Removal of security verification content","Introduction of ChatGPT interface","Addition of login and sign-up options","Inclusion of terms and privacy policy links"]}

{"what_changed":"The removal of the 'Set extension permissions' link under 'Administer' > 'Manage for organization' and the addition of 'About GitHub Copilot Chat' under 'Concepts'","change_type":"update","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["Removal of 'Set extension permissions' link","Addition of 'About GitHub Copilot Chat' under 'Concepts'"]}

{"what_changed":"Addition of a new policy announcement 'Build AI in America' and removal of several news articles","change_type":"update","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Added new policy announcement 'Build AI in America'","Removed news articles from before July 21, 2025"]}

{"what_changed":"Introduction of Perplexity Pro and Max subscription plans with various features and pricing","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Introduction of Perplexity Pro with features like unlimited Pro Search, upgraded AI models, and collaborative spaces","Introduction of Perplexity Max with features like early access to new products, unlimited access to Perplexity Labs and Research, and priority support","Pricing for Perplexity Pro and Max plans","Introduction of exclusive features for Pro and Max subscribers"]}

{"what_changed":"Initial content creation for Midjourney documentation","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Introduction of help center with various sections","Addition of getting started guide","Documentation section for making the most of Midjourney","Billing support section","Policies and guidelines including terms of service, privacy policy, data deletion and privacy FAQ, and community guidelines","Links to Midjourney website and Discord server"]}

{"what_changed":"Introduction of a new pricing page with detailed plan comparisons and features","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Introduction of four subscription tiers: Basic, Standard, Pro, and Mega","Detailed comparison of plan features, including GPU time, image and video generation, and stealth mode","Information on pricing, including monthly and annual rates, and a 20% discount for annual commitments"]}
